name: Ghost Of A Chance 1: Madness Maze
name_original: Ghost Of A Chance 1: Madness Maze
description:
Story:

you, a tea loving ghost who lives in a dungeon wakes up one morning to see that all your tea is gone!
you must talk to things, figure out puzzles to get the fabled "infinite tea"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

controls: 

arrow keys or WASD to move

walk into a object to interact/see if it is interactable.

when in a conversation or interacting with an object click any key to make the text keep going

if you clicked full screen and controls are not working, click the screen then try.
